hanzi-su-wiki:
妨

Значения

Препятствовать, мешать

Мнемоника

Девушка 女 в стороне 方 — препятствие для работы.
purpleculture_pinyin:
fáng
to hinder; (in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm; (what) harm
препятствовать; (отрицательно или вопросительно) (нет) вред; (какой) вред
rtega_mnemonic:
妨妨RSinterfere with, impede, obstruct, disturb
  • woman 女 interfering with a man carrying a load 方
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
不妨 [ bù fáng ]: there is no harm in; might as well
妨碍 [ fáng ài ]: to hinder; to obstruct
何妨 [ hé fáng ]: what harm is there in (doing sth)
妨害 [ fáng hài ]: to impair; damaging; harmful; a nuisance
无妨 [ wú fáng ]: no harm (in doing it); One might as well.; It won't hurt.; no matter; it's no bother
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 方 [ fāng ] square, rectangle; side; region; flag
heisig_chinese_memo: When a beautiful woman comes my direction it hinders my thinking. &nbsp
heisig_story: Imagine a compass that is disturbed every time a woman passes by, sending the needle spinning madly round and round.
koohiiStory1: Capt. Jack Sparrow´s compass gets disturbed every time a beautiful woman walks by him (just picture Keira Knightley in her sexy asian outfit as Elizabeth and the image will be fixed forever).
koohiiStory2: One way to Disturb a woman is to give her directions while she is in the middle of driving -- she just can´t take that kind of stress.
jp_example_words:
妨害(ぼうがい): disturbance, obstruction, hindrance, jamming, interference
妨げる(さまたげる): disturb, prevent
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A woman moving in one direction will obstruct any other women coming from the other direction. Women are very stubborn, so when a woman decides she is going one direction, she will obstruct anything from getting past her or changing her course.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this woman, obstructing your path. She’s fuming and furious and won’t let anyone past her. Imagine how angry she looks and how terrified you are of her. It’s scary.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Since this woman decided to obstruct the path here, you need to figure out how to get past. Probably the best idea is to throw a bowling (ぼう) ball at her. Bowling balls are heavy, so that will be sure to get her out of the way. Just throw a bowling ball in her direction.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now imagine that you are the woman. Feel the bowling ball hit you in the stomach as it crushes your ribs and knocks you back. Bowling balls hurt.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the way (方) of women (女) is to disturb (!)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When a beautiful woman comes my direction it hinders my thinking. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " female " to " fang " sound. The original meaning is damage. "Said Wen": "Nothing, harm. From female, Fang Sheng." "Guang Yun. "Yang Yun": "No, no harm." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Three Years of Yin Gong" "The husband is cheap and expensive, the young husband is long, the distant relatives, the old between the new, the small and the big, the lewdness breaks the righteousness, the so-called six inverses." Kong Yingdashu: "No, it means harm." "Han Fei. Difficulty 2: "Do not use small merits to hinder major tasks, and do not use selfish desires to harm people."

The extension of " hurt " means obstruction or hindrance. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Jixia": "When doing without issuing an order, it is to hinder the affairs of Shennong." "Han Shu. "Wang Gong Liang Gong Bao Biography": "When I saw Emperor Xiaocheng, my foreign relatives held power, and everyone led their privates to fill the court, hinder the way of the virtuous, muddy the world, luxuriate and perish, and the poor people."

" Nothing " also means suspension. Such as "Golden History. "Zhang Zongji": "Ding Hai, a direct scholar of the imperial imperial court, Chen Daren, prevented his post from studying "Liao History"."
humanum_short_description_en: From " female " to " fang " sound. The original meaning is damage, and extension means hindrance.
humanum_full_description:
從「女」，「方」聲。本義是損害。《說文》：「妨，害也。从女，方聲。」《廣韻．陽韻》：「妨，妨害。」如《左傳．隱公三年》「且夫賤妨貴，少陵長，遠間親，新間舊，小加大，淫破義，所謂六逆也。」孔穎達疏：「妨，謂有所害。」《韓非子．難二》：「不以小功妨大務，不以私欲害人事。」

　　「妨」引申表示阻礙、妨礙。如《呂氏春秋．季夏》：「無發令而干時，以妨神農之事。」《漢書．王貢兩龔鮑傳》：「竊見孝成皇帝時，外親持權，人人牽引所私以充塞朝廷，妨賢人路，濁亂天下，奢泰亡度，窮困百姓。」

　　「妨」還表示中止。如《金史．章宗紀》：「丁亥，勅翰林直學士陳大任妨本職專修《遼史》。」
humanum_short_description: 從「女」，「方」聲。本義是損害，引申表示阻礙。

從「 女 」，「 方 」聲。本義是損害。《說文》：「妨，害也。从女，方聲。」《廣韻．陽韻》：「妨，妨害。」如《左傳．隱公三年》「且夫賤妨貴，少陵長，遠間親，新間舊，小加大，淫破義，所謂六逆也。」孔穎達疏：「妨，謂有所害。」《韓非子．難二》：「不以小功妨大務，不以私欲害人事。」 「 妨 」引申表示阻礙、妨礙。如《呂氏春秋．季夏》：「無發令而干時，以妨神農之事。」《漢書．王貢兩龔鮑傳》：「竊見孝成皇帝時，外親持權，人人牽引所私以充塞朝廷，妨賢人路，濁亂天下，奢泰亡度，窮困百姓。」 「 妨 」還表示中止。如《金史．章宗紀》：「丁亥，勅翰林直學士陳大任妨本職專修《遼史》。」

妨字的基本解释

妨
fáng
阻碍，伤害：妨碍。妨害。无妨。不妨。何妨。
迷信的人指某人或某物对人不利：妨主。妨家。

妨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fáng］
［《廣韻》敷方切，平陽，敷。］
［《廣韻》敷亮切，去漾，敷。］
(1)伤害，损害。
(2)阻碍；妨碍。
(3)迷信者所谓犯尅。

妨字的英文翻译

◎ 妨
hamper, harm, hinder, impede

妨字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妨； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页257第10
【廣韻】【集韻】敷方切【正韻】敷房切，?音芳。【說文】害也。一曰礙也。【隋書·太子勇傳】數被讒毀，歎曰：我大覺身妨。　又敷亮切，音訪。【韓愈·岳陽樓別竇司直詩】軒然大波起，宇宙隘而妨。巍峩拔嵩華，騰躍較健壯。

妨字的源字形

妨字的起名意思

意为损害，有害于，阻碍。

妨
形声字。女表意,篆书形体像一位隱跪着的女子,表示男女放纵性欲有损身体;方(ang)表声,方有并合义,意指男女
交媾。本义是损害。

妨|妨
「楷
。
вред
Пиктофонетические символы.
Женщина выражает смысл, шрифт печати подобен женщине, стоящей на коленях, что указывает на то, что потворство сексуальному желанию между мужчиной и женщиной вредно для тела; клык (анг) выражает звук, а квадрат является синонимом, что означает, что мужчины и женщины имеют половой акт.
Первоначальное значение - повреждение.
Вредить; препятствовать: ~ мешать | ~ вредить "нет ~".
~ препятствовать ~ без вреда ~ что ~ нет ~
Мешать
"Кай
fáng, fāng
гл.
1) вредить; причинять вред; приносить несчастье
白鼻子狗妨主人 собака с белым носом приносит несчастье хозяину
2) мешать, препятствовать; препятствие, помеха
何妨试试看? что мешает проверить?, почему бы не попробовать?
Radicals: 女, 方  (woman, direction)
Meaning Mnemonic
A woman moving in one direction will obstruct any other women coming from the other direction. Women are very stubborn, so when a woman decides she is going one direction, she will obstruct anything from getting past her or changing her course.
Picture this woman, obstructing your path. She’s fuming and furious and won’t let anyone past her. Imagine how angry she looks and how terrified you are of her. It’s scary.
Reading Mnemonic
Since this woman decided to obstruct the path here, you need to figure out how to get past. Probably the best idea is to throw a bowling (ぼう) ball at her. Bowling balls are heavy, so that will be sure to get her out of the way. Just throw a bowling ball in her direction.
Now imagine that you are the woman. Feel the bowling ball hit you in the stomach as it crushes your ribs and knocks you back. Bowling balls hurt.
